main event: A witness reported observing a bright, light-colored object in the sky, which seemed to have a dome on top and a glowing base, moving rapidly in a northwest direction on May 15, 22.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 minutes before it disappeared from view., The witness described the object as having no visible propulsion system and unlike anything he had seen before., The sighting involved a detailed questionnaire filled by the witness including estimates of speed and distance., The object was seen at a high altitude and moved rapidly without making any sound., The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigation, but the conclusion was 'Unable to Identify'.
sighted object: a bright, light-colored object with a dome and glowing base
witness description: Central Tower Operator - U.S.A.F., 22 years old, male
